definitions: a person who tends to see the worst aspect of things or believe that the worst will happen

examples.text: the pessimists point to ways in which life has deteriorated

shortDefinitions: person who tends to see worst aspect of things

definitions: a person who believes that this world is as bad as it could be or that evil will ultimately prevail over good

examples.text: he finds solace in the writings of pessimist philosophers

shortDefinitions: person who believes that this world is as bad as it could be or that evil will ultimately prevail over good
